title: Mini-Ep 85: Soft Lips and Dry Scalps
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 85: Soft Lips and Dry Scalps
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree share listeners’ tips and tricks for combatting dry, itchy scalps, hear from a listener worried about air pollution affecting their health, and discuss the best lip masks and balms to keep your lips soft and s...
description:
On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree share listeners’ tips and tricks for combatting dry, itchy scalps, hear from a listener worried about air pollution affecting their health, and discuss the best lip masks and balms to keep your lips soft and supple all winter long. Plus: A Trader Joe’s beauty product shout out!


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Buffy - For $20 off a comforter visit buffy.co and enter promo code F35 at checkout.
  • Away - For $20 off a suitcase visit awaytravel.com/serums and enter promo code serums at checkout.
  • Thirdlove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Joybird - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.
  • TodayTix - Go to todaytix.com/forever35 for $10 off your first purchase.
  • Proven Skincare - Go to www.provenskincare.com/forever35 and use promo code FOREVER 35 to get 10% off.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
